subject: Dear Friend
body:
Dear Friend
I am a member of the Nigerian independent corrupt practice commission
(ICPC) an organized government agency in charge of fighting internet
fraud and scam related issues.I was mandated by the new Nigerian
president (Bola Ahmed Tinub) after his speech at The 78th United
Nations General Assembly meeting held from (19 to 26.09.2023)  in
which This year theme for the debate was to  Accelerating action
towards Rebuilding trust and reigniting global solidarity with our
foreign  contractor who are victims of scams
we sincerely apologize with regards to the high level of mental
trauma caused by those unscrupulous element who defrauded you, I know
that such an unpredictable emotions and strained relationships are
difficult to forget.. I am promising you peace of mind and complete
healing from Emotional and Psychological Trauma if you are willing to
comply.
Currently we are working on your contract/ inheritance funds
transfer digital certificate electronic system that proves the
authenticity of your claim and amount involved,
please you are required to forward to us your complete details
such as your phone number whatsapp number to be precise, your address
etc, exact contract amount you are expecting to receive is of great
important for your reconfirmation and to assist ascertain the True
Copy and notarized copy of your original digital/electronic Certified
transfer document that will guarantee the urgent and immediate release
of your fund.
Regards,
Yours truly,
Professor Bolaji Owasanoye
SAN (Chairman) â€“ ICPC
(+234-902-014-8912)

subject: Re:   Dear Friend
body:
Dear Professor Bolaji Owasanoye,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in fighting internet fraud and scams. It's unfortunate that there are individuals who engage in such activities and cause mental trauma to innocent people.

I understand the importance of providing complete details for the transfer of my contract funds. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. How long does it usually take for the digital electronic system to verify and transfer the funds?
2. Are there any fees or charges involved in this process? If so, what are they and how can I ensure their legitimacy?
3. Can you provide more information about the True Copy and notarized copy of the original digital electronic Certified transfer document? How does it guarantee the release of my funds?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Randall
